app.title: {{config.instanceName}}
app.subtitle: Share your ideas to improve life in {{config.entityName}}

beta.title: Beta Access
beta.description: This site is currently in testing phase. Please enter the password to continue.
beta.errorRateLimited: Too many attempts. Please wait a moment and try again.

auth.displayNameHelp: This is the name that will be publicly displayed
auth.passwordHint: Minimum 12 characters with uppercase, lowercase, number and special character.
auth.sessionExpired: Your session has expired. Please login again to continue.
auth.rateLimitExceeded: Too many attempts. Please try again in a few minutes.
auth.loginByEmailDescription: We'll send a 6-digit code to your email
auth.codeExpired: Code expired. Please request a new one.

ideas.title: Title
ideas.myIdeasDescription: View and manage all your submitted ideas
ideas.noIdeasMessage: You haven't submitted any ideas yet. Share your innovative ideas to improve {{config.entityName}}!
ideas.noIdeas: No ideas yet. Be the first to submit one!
ideas.beTheFirst: Be the first to submit an idea!
ideas.titlePlaceholder: Enter a clear and concise title
ideas.descriptionHelp: Be specific and explain how your idea will benefit {{config.entityName}}
ideas.submitDescription: Share your innovative ideas to improve {{config.entityName}}
ideas.addTags: Add tags to categorize your idea...
ideas.editDescription: Update your idea and resubmit for approval
ideas.editRejectedInfo: Editing this idea will resubmit it for approval. Make changes based on the admin feedback below.
ideas.notOwner: You can only edit your own ideas
ideas.cannotEditPendingEdit: This idea is awaiting re-approval and cannot be edited
ideas.editApprovedWarning: Editing this idea will send it back for moderation
ideas.editApprovedInfo: Editing this approved idea will send it back for moderation. Your votes and comments will be preserved.
ideas.editApprovedConfirmCheckbox: I understand my idea will be hidden until re-approved by moderators
ideas.editRateLimitError: You have reached the edit limit for this month
ideas.editCooldownError: Please wait {{hours}} hours before editing again
ideas.ideaHiddenDuringReview: Your idea will be hidden until re-approved
ideas.pendingEditMessage: Your idea has been edited and is awaiting re-approval by moderators. It will be hidden from the public until approved.

similarIdeas.title: Similar Ideas Found
similarIdeas.description: We found existing ideas similar to yours. Consider supporting these ideas instead of creating a duplicate.
similarIdeas.noSimilarFound: No similar ideas found. Your idea appears to be unique!
similarIdeas.warningMessage: Before submitting, please review these similar ideas to avoid duplicates.

vote.cannotVoteOwnIdea: You cannot vote on your own idea

qualities.title: What makes this idea stand out?

comments.title: Comments
comments.noComments: No comments yet. Be the first to comment!
comments.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this comment?
comments.deleteDescription: This action cannot be undone. The comment will be permanently deleted.
comments.cannotLikeOwn: You cannot like your own comment

admin.title: Admin Panel

officials.title: Officials Management
officials.subtitle: Manage city officials who have access to the analytics dashboard
officials.noOfficials: No officials have been added yet
officials.grantDescription: Search for a user and grant them official status
officials.revokeConfirm: Are you sure you want to revoke official status from this user?
officials.rejectConfirm: Are you sure you want to reject this official request?

categoryAdmins.title: Category Admin Management
categoryAdmins.subtitle: Assign users as moderators for specific categories
categoryAdmins.removeConfirm: Are you sure you want to remove category admin rights from this user?
categoryAdmins.addDescription: Select a user and a category to moderate
categoryAdmins.alreadyAdmin: This user is already an admin of this category

notifications.title: System Notifications
notifications.subtitle: Recent notifications from the last 24 hours
notifications.empty: No notifications in the last 24 hours

diagnostics.title: System Diagnostics
diagnostics.description: Test error tracking, monitoring, and system health
diagnostics.sentryDescription: Test error tracking and session replay
diagnostics.checkDashboard: Wait 30-60s then check Sentry → Session Replay
diagnostics.ntfyNote: Check your ntfy app for the notification
diagnostics.smtpNote: Tests connectivity without sending an email
diagnostics.dbDescription: Check database connectivity and table status
diagnostics.dbNote: Shows database type, tables and connection pool for PostgreSQL
diagnostics.systemResourcesDescription: Monitor server disk, memory, and container usage
diagnostics.systemResourcesNote: Docker metrics require container access to the Docker socket
diagnostics.dockerNotAvailable: Docker not accessible from backend container

admin.categoryId: Category ID (leave empty for global admin)

categories.title: Category Management
categories.createFirst: Get started by creating your first category
categories.createDescription: Add a new category for organizing ideas. Both English and French names are required.
categories.editDescription: Update the category information. Both English and French names are required.
categories.deleteDescription: This action cannot be undone. The category will be permanently deleted.
categories.deleteWarning: This action cannot be undone. The category will be permanently deleted.
categories.deleteConfirmation: Are you sure you want to delete this category?
categories.cannotDelete: Warning: This category cannot be deleted because it contains ideas.
categories.cannotDeleteWithIdeas: This category cannot be deleted because it contains ideas.

users.title: User Management
users.deleteConfirmation: Are you sure you want to delete this user? All their ideas, votes, and comments will also be deleted.
users.cannotDeleteSelf: You cannot delete your own account.
users.usersWillAppear: Users will appear here when they register
users.deleteUserConfirmation: Are you sure you want to delete this user?
users.deleteUserPermanentWarning: All their ideas, votes, and comments will be permanently deleted.
users.userStatisticsDescription: View detailed statistics for this user

ideaDeletion.deleteConfirmMessage: This will remove the idea from public view. An admin can restore it if needed.
ideaDeletion.deleteReasonPlaceholder: Why are you deleting this idea?
ideaDeletion.adminDeleteMessage: This idea will be soft-deleted and can be restored later.
ideaDeletion.reasonRequired: Reason is required for admin deletion

tags.noIdeas: No approved ideas found with this tag.
tags.pressEnter: Press Enter to create new tag

search.title: Search Ideas
search.noResultsHint: Check your spelling or try different keywords. You can also browse ideas by category or popular tags.
search.tryDifferent: Try different keywords or adjust filters
search.enterQuery: Enter at least 2 characters to search

profile.title: My Profile
profile.passwordTooShort: Password must be at least 6 characters
profile.invalidFileType: Invalid file type. Only images allowed

security.title: Security Settings
security.description: Manage your account security and two-factor authentication

data.title: My Data
data.description: Download a copy of all your personal data in compliance with Law 25.
data.downloadDescription: Get a complete copy of your personal data in a machine-readable format.
data.law25Notice: Under Quebec's Law 25, you have the right to access your personal data and download it in a portable format.

delete.title: Delete My Account
delete.warning: This action is irreversible. Once deleted, your account cannot be recovered.
delete.step1Description: What would you like to do with your content (ideas and comments)?
delete.optionAnonymizeDesc: Your ideas and comments will remain visible but will be attributed to 'Deleted User'. Your votes will be removed.
delete.optionDeleteDesc: All your ideas, comments, and votes will be deleted.
delete.success: Your account has been successfully deleted. Thank you for being part of our community.
delete.law25Notice: Under Quebec's Law 25, you have the right to request the deletion of your personal data.

consent.title: Consent Management
consent.description: Manage your consent preferences in compliance with Law 25.
consent.marketingDescription: Receive optional news, updates and announcements.
consent.withdrawWarning: Withdrawing consent to Terms of Service or Privacy Policy will result in your account being deactivated.
consent.law25Notice: Under Quebec's Law 25, you can withdraw your marketing consent as easily as you gave it using the toggle above.

twoFactor.title: Two-Factor Authentication
twoFactor.enterPasswordToRegenerate: Enter your password to regenerate backup codes:
twoFactor.lowBackupCodesWarning: You only have {{count}} backup code(s) left. Consider regenerating new codes.
twoFactor.whatIs2FADescription: Two-factor authentication adds an extra layer of security to your account. After enabling it, you'll need to enter a code from your authenticator app in addition to your password when signing in.
twoFactor.setupDescription: Secure your account with an authenticator app
twoFactor.scanQRCode: Scan this QR code with your authenticator app
twoFactor.enterCodeFromApp: Enter the 6-digit code from your authenticator app
twoFactor.saveBackupCodes: Save these backup codes in a safe place. You can use them to access your account if you lose your phone.
twoFactor.enterBackupCode: Enter one of your 8-character backup codes
twoFactor.disableDescription: Remove two-factor authentication from your account
twoFactor.disableWarning: Disabling 2FA will make your account less secure. You'll only need your password to sign in.
twoFactor.disableError: Failed to disable 2FA. Check your password.

toast.ideaSubmitted: Your idea has been submitted for review
toast.cannotDeleteOthersIdea: You can only delete your own ideas
toast.sessionExpiring: Your session will expire in {{minutes}} minutes
toast.error: Something went wrong. Please try again.
toast.permissionDenied: You don't have permission for this action

analytics.title: Analytics Dashboard
analytics.noData: No data available for this period

qualityAnalytics.title: Quality Voting Analytics
qualityAnalytics.subtitle: Insights into how citizens are using quality feedback on votes

weightedScores.title: Weighted Score Analysis
weightedScores.description: Vote manipulation detection based on voter trust
weightedScores.noAnomaliesDescription: All ideas have scores within normal trust-weighted ranges

moderation.alreadyFlagged: You have already reported this content
moderation.reportDescription: Help us maintain a respectful community by reporting content that violates our guidelines.
moderation.selectReasonError: Please select a reason for your report
moderation.detailsPlaceholder: Provide any additional context that might help moderators...
moderation.submitError: Failed to submit report. Please try again.
moderation.hiddenExplanation: This content has been flagged by the community and is pending review by moderators.
moderation.appealDescription: Explain why you believe your suspension should be lifted.
moderation.appealPlaceholder: Please explain why you believe this suspension was issued in error, or why you should be given another chance...
moderation.appealMinLength: Your appeal must be at least 50 characters
moderation.appealAlreadyExists: You have already submitted an appeal for this suspension
moderation.appealSubmitError: Failed to submit appeal. Please try again.
moderation.appealSubmitted: Your appeal has been submitted and will be reviewed by our moderation team.

sidebar.step2Desc: The community votes and comments on ideas
sidebar.step3Desc: Popular ideas get noticed by decision makers

errors.generic: Something went wrong. Please try again.
errors.rateLimitExceeded: Too many exports. Please try again later.

notFound.title: Page not found
notFound.description: The page you're looking for doesn't exist or has been moved.

contactPage.title: Contact Us
contactPage.subtitle: Have a question, suggestion, or need help? We are here for you.
contactPage.thankYou: Thank you for contacting us. We will get back to you as soon as possible.
contactPage.name: Name
contactPage.subject: Subject
contactPage.messagePlaceholder: Describe your question or issue in detail...
contactPage.errorSending: Failed to send message. Please try again later.
contactPage.errorRateLimited: Too many requests. Please wait a while before trying again.

footer.description: A citizen platform to share your ideas and improve life in {{config.entityName}}. Together, let's shape the future of our community.

signup.officialExplanation: Check this if you are an official and need access to analytics data. Your request will be manually verified.
signup.officialVerificationNote: An administrator will verify your official status
signup.officialRequestExplanation: Thank you for your interest! Your request for official access has been submitted and will be reviewed by an administrator.
signup.step1AccountCreated: Your account has been created and is active
signup.step2ReviewPending: An admin will review your official status request
signup.step3AccessGranted: Once approved, you'll have access to the analytics dashboard
signup.canUseNormally: In the meantime, you can use the platform like any other citizen.
signup.acceptsTermsRequired: You must accept the Terms of Service
signup.acceptsPrivacyRequired: You must accept the Privacy Policy
signup.marketingConsent: I agree to receive optional communications (news, updates)

officials.adoptionRateTooltip: Percentage of upvotes where users also selected quality feedback. Higher adoption means more detailed citizen feedback.
officials.totalUpvotesTooltip: Total number of positive votes cast on all ideas across the platform.
officials.votesWithQualitiesTooltip: Number of upvotes where users selected one or more quality attributes to explain their support.
officials.qualityTypesTooltip: Number of different quality categories available for users to select.
officials.noIdeasFound: No ideas found matching your filters
officials.title: Title
officials.noQualitiesYet: No qualities have been assigned to this idea yet.
officials.exportMobileWarning: CSV export works best on desktop. On mobile, the file will be downloaded but may be harder to view.
officials.accessDenied: You do not have permission to access this page
officials.tryAgainLater: Please try again in a moment.

cookies.title: Cookie Notice
cookies.notice: This site uses essential cookies for authentication and your preferences. We do not use any tracking or advertising cookies.

queue.title: Moderation Queue
queue.description: Review flagged content from the community

dialog.dismissDescription: This will dismiss all flags on this content and make it visible again.
dialog.actionDescription: This will permanently delete the content and mark all flags as actioned.
dialog.penaltyReasonPlaceholder: Explain why this penalty is being issued...

flaggedUsers.title: Flagged Users
flaggedUsers.emptyDescription: No users have been flagged by the community.

appeals.title: Appeals Queue
appeals.approveDescription: Approving will revoke the user's penalty and restore their access.
appeals.rejectDescription: Rejecting will maintain the user's penalty.

watchlist.title: Keyword Watchlist
watchlist.description: Manage keywords that automatically flag content
watchlist.emptyDescription: Add keywords to automatically flag matching content.
watchlist.addKeywordDescription: Content matching this keyword will be automatically flagged.
watchlist.testKeywordDescription: Test if a keyword matches sample text.
watchlist.matchFound: Match found! This text would be flagged.
watchlist.noMatch: No match. This text would not be flagged.
watchlist.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this keyword?

comments.title: Pending Comments
comments.description: Review and approve comments from new users
comments.rejectConfirm: Are you sure you want to reject this comment?

notes.title: Admin Notes
notes.placeholder: Add a note about this user...
notes.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this note?
